channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 06:47 Close the threat of Artobstil in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Take care of further reports.
item.description: 🟢 06:47 Close the threat of Artobstil in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community. Take care of further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.description: 🟡 05:04 Alarm to Dnipropetrovsk region.
